title: Search Descriptor
description: Describes search annotations for specific properties of the schemas.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: The unique identifier for the schema descriptor. This property is required when the descriptor is defined outside of the applicable schema, but is optional when applied via 'meta:descriptors'.

_type.title: Type
_type.description: The type of descriptor this object represents.

sourceSchema.title: Source Schema
sourceSchema.description: The source schema this descriptor applies to. This property is required when the descriptor is defined outside of the applicable schema, but is optional when applied via 'meta:descriptors'

sourceProperty.title: Source Property
sourceProperty.description: When present, the property of the source schema to which this descriptor applies. This value is a JSON Pointer, applied to an instance of an object described by `xdm:sourceSchema`.

indexed.title: Indexed
indexed.description: Whether the property is indexable and searchable.

filterable.title: Filterable
filterable.description: Whether the property can be used as a filter in search queries.

store.title: Stored
store.description: Whether the property value is stored in, and therefore can be retrieved from, the index.

sort.title: Sort Type
sort.description: Whether and how search results can be sorted on this property.

analyzers.title: Analyzers
analyzers.description: A set of analyzers to be applied when indexing this property.

defaultAnalyzer.title: Default analyzer
defaultAnalyzer.description: Default analyzer to be applied when search queries are made against this property.
